p: The present study aimed at investigating the in vitro antimicrobial activity of OV EO through illustrating its biostatic, biocidal and the dynamics of the biocidal activity against 11 different American Type Culture Collection (ATCC) microbial strains microorganisms. This was in addition to chemical profiling of the essential oil using GC/MS technique in order to relate the antimicrobial activity to the essential oil composition.
